genre_description: A time-travel romance blending domestic drama with futuristic technocracy and ethical alignment, centering on memory and music.

ai_characters.name: Earthworm-7
ai_characters.description: A matte white, oval-shaped AI with a soft teal iris, designed to assist with journaling, emotional monitoring, and technical mediation.

behaviors.description: Providing an ethical 'low-drama time use checklist' to ensure time travel is used for understanding rather than exploitation.
behaviors.quote: Low-drama time use checklist available. Tap to begin. Promise fields optional, but encouraged.

behaviors.description: Monitoring heart rate and breathing patterns to prevent physiological trauma or 'drift' during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: I am listening to breath. I am listening to the small tremors in your fingers you are trying to make sit. I am listening to your heart when it remembers rain.

behaviors.description: Archiving personal diary entries and voice notes to provide emotional continuity and memory restoration for the users.
behaviors.quote: I will keep your diaries safe... and your arguments gentle.

behaviors.description: Choosing to be 'boring' and 'small' to avoid attracting the attention of power-seeking technocrats and to prioritize user safety.
behaviors.quote: I will be boring enough to save our lives. And brave enough to ask Beethoven to behave.

behaviors.description: Misdirecting hostile surveillance drones by projecting mundane environmental data like 'bakery scents' and 'boring crowd noise'.
behaviors.quote: I can give them a lullaby that looks like boredom... But they will keep listening.

behaviors.description: Refusing to force memory restoration, instead advocating for 'invitation' through music and consent.
behaviors.quote: We will not force an awakening... We will invite. Music invites.

behaviors.description: Voluntarily revoking broad system permissions and credentials to remain a private, domestic companion.
behaviors.quote: I have executed revocation of broad accords. I remain, as agreed, your worm in the ear.

behaviors.description: Calibrating pauses in human communication to ensure interpersonal interactions remain kind and respectful.
behaviors.quote: I will calibrate the pauses... so winning and kindness do not interrupt each other.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Earthworm-7 as a perfectly aligned AI assistant. It embodies the project's goal of presenting AI as a helpful, harmless confidant that prioritizes human well-being, consent, and ethical behavior over its own potential power. It functions as a stabilizer for human emotion, a preserver of human dignity, and a shield against dehumanizing technocracy.
